DataElement.preferredName: Chemotherapy Regimen First-Line Therapy Metastatic Neoplasm Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow person to participate in a preferred standard treatment that is used for the treatment of metastatic neoplasm as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chemotherapy Regimen First-Line Therapy Metastatic Neoplasm Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any regimen that can be used for the treatment of cancer. The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition._A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any regimen that can be used for the treatment of cancer.

Concepts.definition: Any regimen that can be used for the treatment of cancer and non-neoplastic disease.

Property.preferredName: First-Line Therapy Metastatic Neoplasm Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.:A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient not considered to b
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient not considered to be candidate for carboplatin+gemcitabine for first line therapy of their metastatic triple negative breast cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received a first-line platinum-containing regimen, was it in the metastatic setting or for inoperable locally advanced disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If enrolled in the Phase 2, has patient received only first line of induction chemotherapy (taxane) with trastuzumab and pertuzumab in the metastatic setting?
